pullrequest.title: Support frame semantics in for models nested with <include>

content.raw:
Per f2f, there could be a bug where collision names might be renamed to the nested name accidentally.

e.g. in included model “mid\_model”, we have link name “a”, with collision name “a”.

Correct behavior \(for merging approach\) would be to have “mid\_model::a”, with collision “a”.

Current text replacement will have link “mid\_model::a” with collision “mid\_model::a”, which is a bug, but minor.

Could also have issues where a link is named “fixed”, and then joint types get replaced…
content.html:
Per f2f, there could be a bug where collision names might be renamed to the nested name accidentally.

e.g. in included model “mid_model”, we have link name “a”, with collision name “a”.

Correct behavior (for merging approach) would be to have “mid_model::a”, with collision “a”.

Current text replacement will have link “mid_model::a” with collision “mid_model::a”, which is a bug, but minor.

Could also have issues where a link is named “fixed”, and then joint types get replaced…
